A shower is a place in which a person bathes under a spray of typically warm or hot water. Indoors, there is a drain in the floor. Most showers have temperature, spray pressure and adjustable showerhead nozzle.
Shower doors are glass doors that are installed in showers to prevent water from leaking out of the shower area.
